name: Metropolis-VisitplacesoftheEarth
0:
”Alexa, ask Metro Polis for a map of New York”
”Alexa, open Metro Polis and locate Berlin”
”Alexa, open Metro Polis and go to Sidney”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: metro polis
des:
The skill "Metropolis" shows maps of cities and places from all over the world using the service from HERE. Of course you need a device with display to make use of this skill. 

Results and navigation elements are presented differently depending on the device used.

When looking at a map you have a number of options for navigation: 

- "Zoom In"
- "Zoom Out"

- "Go North"
- "Go South"
- "Go West"
- "Go East"

- "Go to London / Paris / New York / Sidney"

Start:

- "Alexa open Metropolis"
- "Alexa, ask Metropolis for a map of New York"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
